meanings.definition: Belonging to the same time period.
meanings.sent1: The contempo cars in the museum all came from the same era.
meanings.sent2: The art pieces in the gallery are contempo with each other.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see the contempo outfits at the historical reenactment.
meanings.sent4: The contempo architecture of the building blended seamlessly with the old town.
meanings.sent5: The contempo music playing in the background set the perfect mood for the event.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is contemporary.
meanings.sent1: She is a contempo in the field of technology, always up to date with the latest trends.
meanings.sent2: The artist is considered a contempo for his innovative approach to painting.
meanings.sent3: The contempo at the party was the talk of the town with his charming personality.
meanings.sent4: The new smartphone model is a contempo in the world of gadgets.
meanings.sent5: As a contempo, he brings fresh ideas to the team, making him a valuable member.

meanings.sent1: She decorated her room contempo, with modern furniture and vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show displayed clothing items contempo designed for the younger generation.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared the dish contempo, adding a unique twist to the traditional recipe.
meanings.sent4: The dance performance was executed contempo, blending classical moves with modern choreography.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibition showcased paintings created contempo by local artists.
